name: War Disciples
background:
Havoc Disciples are Battle Brothers who have embraced the worship of a particular Havoc God. Individually powerful and resilient, each Havoc Disciple has been molded with unique blessings by the god they follow. 

Stranded in the Sirius Sector, many Battle Brothers were scattered and left with little chance of survival. These desperate castaways were approached by different gods who offered powerful boons in exchange for their worship. Each god empowered their respective followers, reforging their Disciples according to their will. The Havoc Disciples are now torn between fanatical devotion to their new gods and maintaining their former discipline.
backgroundFull:
On arriving in the Sirius Sector, the Founder’s fleet was scattered and damaged. Most of these ships and their crews were discounted as destroyed, but had in fact arrived safely in Sirius far from the rest of humanity. Many believed themselves to be the sole survivors of the fleet and that they were likely the only humans in this strange new galaxy. Without any idea of how they might return to Earth, most of the scattered Battle Brothers were forced to contend with their inevitable deaths in a strange new galaxy.

Humanity was not alone in this galaxy however, and the arrival of these strange interlopers drew the eyes of powerful entities in Sirius: the Havoc Gods. These gods bided their time and reached out to the Battle Brothers in their most desperate moments. Each Havoc God sought to sway these new arrivals to their influence through various gifts and boons.

The God of War offered strength, allowing its Disciples to triumph over their foes. Change granted its followers knowledge and secrets, necessary for understanding their place in this new galaxy. Plague offered renewed vitality to those taken by disease. While Lust offered redemption and power to those cast out by the Battle Brothers. 

Those who accepted the pact were granted powerful boons by their patrons, who reforged them in their image. These Havoc Disciples repaid their gifts with a fanatical loyalty, willing to devote their lives to the god who had chosen them. Disciples began to seek each other out, forming new bands utterly dedicated to their respective god. 

Yet the fanaticism demanded by their faith was often at odds with the discipline required to maintain their cohesion as a unit. While some Disciples recognized organization as a necessary means to achieving their God’s goals against powerful foes, others viewed it as a mere distraction, and cared little about structure that once defined their lives as Battle Brothers. As a result, many bands are held together through brute force, as leaders struggle to preserve order amongst fanatics. Others have collapsed into marauding hordes of zealots, roving blindly through the sector as they spread havoc in the name of their god.

How will your devotion guide you?

spells.name: Flame of Destruction
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 18", which takes 1 hit with Blast(3).

spells.name: Fiery Protection
spells.effect: Pick up to four friendly units within 12", which get Melee Evasion once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Headtaker Strike
spells.effect: Pick up to six enemy units within 12", which take 1 hit with AP(2) each.

specialRules.name: Unpredictable Fighter
specialRules.description: When in melee, roll one die and apply one effect to all models with this rule: on a 1-3 they get AP(+1), and on a 4-6 they get +1 to hit rolls instead.

specialRules.name: Warbound Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Warbound Boost. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Slam
specialRules.description: Ignores Cover, and on unmodified results of 1 to block hits, this weapon deals 1 extra wound.

specialRules.name: Mend
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick one friendly model within 3" with Tough, and remove D3 wounds from it.

specialRules.name: Warbound
specialRules.description: Enemies that roll to block hits from this model's weapons take 1 extra wound for each unmodified result of 1 that they roll.

specialRules.name: Versatile Defense Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Versatile Defense. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Versatile Attack
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated, pick one effect: until the end of the activation all models with this rule in it either get AP(+1) when attacking, or get +1 to hit rolls when attacking.

specialRules.name: Furious Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Furious. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Relentless Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Relentless. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Scout Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Scout. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Resistance Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Resistance. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Dangerous Terrain Debuff
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 enemy units within 18", which must immediately take a Dangerous Terrain test.

specialRules.name: Piercing Assault
specialRules.description: This model gets AP(+1) when charging.

specialRules.name: Steadfast Buff
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 friendly units within 12", which gets Steadfast once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Warbound Boost
specialRules.description: If this model has Warbound, enemies taking wounds from it take extra wounds on failed defense rolls of 1-2 from Warbound (instead of only on 1).

specialRules.name: Ignores Cover
specialRules.description: This weapon ignores cover.

specialRules.name: Tough
specialRules.description: This model only rolls to check wound effects once it has taken at least X wounds, and is only Knocked Out on rolls of 5+X or more.

specialRules.name: Versatile Defense
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule is deployed or activated, pick one effect: when shot or charged from over 9" away, the unit either gets +1 to defense rolls, or enemy units get -1 to hit rolls against it. This effect lasts until the units' next activation.

specialRules.name: Defense
specialRules.description: This model gets +X to defense rolls.

specialRules.name: Furious
specialRules.description: When charging, unmodified results of 6 to hit in melee deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Relentless
specialRules.description: When this model shoots at enemies over 9" away, unmodified results of 6 to hit deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Scout
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. After all other units are deployed, may be deployed anywhere fully within 12” of their deployment zone. Players alternate in placing Scout units, starting with the player that activates next.

specialRules.name: Resistance
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule takes wounds, roll one die for each. On a 6+ it is ignored. If the wounds were from a spell, then they are ignored on a 2+ instead.

specialRules.name: Steadfast
specialRules.description: If a unit where all models have this rule is Shaken at the beginning of the round, roll one die. On a 4+, it stops being Shaken.

specialRules.name: Melee Evasion
specialRules.description: Enemies get -1 to hit rolls in melee when attacking units where all models have this rule.

specialRules.name: Blast
specialRules.description: Ignores cover, and after resolving other special rules, each hit is multiplied by X, where X is up to as many hits as enemy models in the target unit and within 3” of it. Hits must be split evenly between all enemy units within 3” of any model from the target (defender picks how).

specialRules.name: Break
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and on unmodified results of 6 to hit, those hits get AP(+2).
